active_learning.discussion_prompt: In an era of sophisticated ransomware, debate whether the traditional 3-2-1 backup strategy is still adequate. Compare/contrast it with immutable and air-gapped backups, considering trade-offs in cost, recovery speed, and security effectiveness. Address common misconceptions about backup invulnerability.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Bloom's Taxonomy, active learning, and scaffolding. Topic: Backup and Restore Mechanisms (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security Architecture And Engineering > Secure Design Principles > Resilience and Failure Management > Continuity and Recovery > Backup and Restore Mechanisms). Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT learning_objectives JSON ARRAY HERE] - Active Learning: [INSERT active_learning JSON OBJECT HERE] - Scaffolding Layers: [INSERT scaffolding JSON OBJECT HERE] - Flashcard Schema: Strictly follow [INSERT flashcard_schema JSON OBJECT HERE] Big Picture: Ensures CIA Availability, ransomware resilience, NIST CSF Recover function. Generate 25 high-quality flashcards progressively: 6 Layer 1 (REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND), 6 Layer 2 (UNDERSTAND/APPLY), 7 Layer 3 (APPLY/ANALYZE), 6 Layer 4 (EVALUATE/CREATE). Vary types (10 MCQ, 10 Q&A, 5 Cloze). Use distractors per protocol. Tie explanations to sources, concept map, and activities. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards: [{'type': '...', 'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'hints': '...'}, 'mcq_options': ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D'] if MCQ}]. No extra text.
